properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 2:31AM PST until February 16 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...MOUNTAIN SNOW THIS WEEKEND...

.A moist Pacific storm system will spread accumulating snow
today into Sunday across the higher terrain of southeast
Washington and portions of northern Idaho.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches.

* WHERE...Moscow, Potlatch, and Genesee.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will likely be difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY
